items.name: Eyes of the Greatwolf
flavourText: I am but a vessel for a greater force.
It acts through me. Speaks through me.
Decides what lives and dies through me.
And will change the world through me.

items.name: Divination Distillate
explicitMods: 12% increased Quantity of Items found during Effect
30% increased Rarity of Items found during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: Knowledge is fermented in pain and loss
Distilled with reflection
To quench the thirst of those
who dream of enlightenment

items.name: Goldwyrm
enchantMods: 80% chance to Avoid being Stunned if you've Killed Recently
flavourText: The wyrm draws warmth from the fires of desire.

properties.name: Spell, AoE, Duration, Fire, Physical, Guard

socketedItems.secDescrText: Applies a buff that adds to your armour, and can take some of the damage from hits for you before being depleted. When the buff expires or is depleted, the skill deals reflected damage to enemies around you based on the total damage that was taken from the buff. Shares a cooldown with other Guard skills.
explicitMods: This Skill's Cooldown does not recover during its effect

75% of Damage from Hits is taken from the Buff before your Life or Energy Shield
Buff can take Damage equal to 15% of your Armour, up to a maximum of 5000
Reflects 3000% of Damage taken from Buff as Fire Damage when Buff expires or is depleted
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casting once reserves mana to carry a banner which increases the armour and evasion of nearby allies, and reduces the critical strike chance of nearby enemies. Gains stages over time while carrying the banner near enemies. Casting the skill again places the banner, ending the mana reservation. Once placed, it becomes more powerful for each stage gained. You cannot have multiple banners at the same time.
explicitMods: You and nearby Allies have 29% increased Armour and Evasion Rating
Nearby Enemies have 40% reduced Critical Strike Chance
Gain 1 Stage every 0.2 seconds while an Enemy is Nearby

Taunt nearby Enemies for 0.15 seconds per Stage on Placing the Banner
Enemies Taunted this way deal 15% less Damage
Base Duration of 10.00 seconds after being Placed
+1 second to Base Placed Banner Duration per Stage
When placed, 8% increased Area of Effect per Stage
When placed, 1% increased Aura effect per Stage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Gain a buff that makes you faster, harder to detect, and grants Phasing, letting you pass through enemies. Performing any skill replaces this buff with one that boosts melee physical damage of skills you use yourself (it will not apply to your melee skills used by totems). Consumes Frenzy Charges to increase duration.
explicitMods: 100% increased Skill Duration per Frenzy Charge removed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill gem. Once this gem reaches level 2 or above, will raise the quality of supported gems. Cannot support skills that don't come from gems.
explicitMods: +24% to Quality of Supported Skill Gems
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Maloney's Mechanism
explicitMods: Trigger a Socketed Bow Skill when you Attack with a Bow, with a 1 second Cooldown
5% chance to Blind Enemies on Hit with Attacks
flavourText: Midnight tinkering begets midday murdering;
a sinister shaft surreptitiously shot slays a scoundrel.
I will see them again, but not until my work is done.

items.name: Headhunter
explicitMods: 21% increased Damage with Hits against Rare monsters
When you Kill a Rare monster, you gain its Modifiers for 60 seconds
flavourText: "A man's soul rules from a cavern of bone, learns and
judges through flesh-born windows. The heart is meat.
The head is where the Man is."
- Lavianga, Advisor to Kaom

items.name: Soul Catcher
enchantMods: Reused at the end of this Flask's effect
explicitMods: 80% increased Critical Strike Chance with Vaal Skills during effect
77% increased Damage with Vaal Skills during effect
Vaal Skills used during effect have 10% reduced Soul Gain Prevention Duration
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: Freedom is for the privileged, even in death.
<default>{This item can be transformed on the Altar of Sacrifice along with Vial of the Ghost}

items.name: Kalandra's Touch
flavourText: On one hand, you have a choice.
On the other, you have its twin.

items.name: Sadima's Touch
implicitMods: Curse Enemies with Elemental Weakness on Hit
explicitMods: Adds 4 to 8 Fire Damage to Attacks
Adds 1 to 13 Lightning Damage to Attacks
flavourText: Wealth unspent is wealth wasted.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Take less Physical and Elemental Damage for a short time. Consumes up to 5 Endurance Charges to lengthen the buff and further lessen Physical Damage taken. Shares a cooldown with other Guard skills.
explicitMods: 20% increased Buff Duration per Endurance Charge removed
This Skill's Cooldown does not recover during its effect
15.0% less Physical Damage taken per Endurance Charge removed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Each supported spell skill will track damage you take, and be triggered when the total damage taken reaches a threshold. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Vaal skills, channelling skills, and skills with a reservation cannot be triggered.
explicitMods: This Gem can only Support Skill Gems requiring Level 42 or lower
You cannot Cast Supported Triggerable Spells directly
Trigger Supported Spells when you take 661 total Damage from Hits
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Grants a buff providing fire damage based on your physical damage. An anomaly defying all odds
The "unkillable" beast met the divine
And Ventor met his latest trophy.
